rows.PRODUCT PERSON — ZERO BUDGET PITCH: How to get a world-class site built with no cash.
THE REALITY
We have $0 for this. We need 2 consumer-grade sites in 2-3 weeks.
This means we need someone who values the OUTPUT more than the PAYMENT.
That person exists. We just have to find them and pitch correctly.
WHO TO TARGET
Profile
Bootcamp grad (3-6 months out)
rows.col_2: Needs portfolio pieces desperately. Has skills, no proof. This is their proof.
rows.col_3: Bootcamp Slack channels, Twitter, LinkedIn "open to work"
rows.col_4: MEDIUM — skills may be uneven. Spec must be tight.

rows.PRODUCT PERSON — ZERO BUDGET PITCH: Freelancer building practice
rows.col_2: Needs a signature project to anchor their portfolio. Most client work is forgettable.
rows.col_3: Dribbble, Behance, indie hacker communities, Product Hunt
rows.col_4: LOW — already proven. Just need to sell the vision.

rows.PRODUCT PERSON — ZERO BUDGET PITCH: Designer at a job they hate
rows.col_2: Wants to build something beautiful. Current job is another SaaS dashboard.
rows.col_3: Design Twitter, side project communities, "I quit my job" posts
rows.col_4: LOW — high skill. Need to match availability (evenings/weekends).

rows.PRODUCT PERSON — ZERO BUDGET PITCH: CS/Design student
rows.col_2: Best capstone project ever. Professor would grade this an A.
rows.col_3: University design programs, HCI programs, CS departments
rows.col_4: MEDIUM — may need more guidance. But highly motivated.

rows.PRODUCT PERSON — ZERO BUDGET PITCH: No-code builder
rows.col_2: Can ship fast with Framer/Webflow. May not match "consumer-grade" bar.
rows.col_4: HIGH — speed is good but quality bar is critical. Vet portfolio hard.

rows.PRODUCT PERSON — ZERO BUDGET PITCH: THE PITCH
Subject: Build the best portfolio piece of your career (equity, not cash)
We're launching a company using the most documented launch process ever created.
888-tab operating model. Built with AI. Validated by experts.
Now we need the site.
Two sites. 2-3 weeks. Consumer-grade. Think Remedy Meds quality
(remedymeds.com) applied to a company launch tracker.
Password-protected. Daily video updates from our MC.
Cinematic quality. The kind of thing that makes people say
'wait, THIS is a startup launch page?'
We can't pay cash right now. What we can offer:
• 2-4% equity in IonWave (real equity, real cap table, real lawyer)
• Full portfolio rights (your name on it, your case study forever)
• Paid retroactively from the raise (if funded within 90 days)
• Reference from a YC/Greylock-backed founder
• The site itself as your calling card
The spec is ready. The content exists. The brand system exists.
You're not designing in a vacuum — you're building something real
with real people behind it.
Interested? [Link to password-protected preview / Loom walkthrough]
ALTERNATIVES IF EQUITY PITCH FAILS
Plan B: No-code MVP
PM co-founder builds site in Framer/Webflow. Not as polished.
MC does daily video updates even without a beautiful site.
Upgrade to consumer-grade after raise.
Plan C: Template customization
Buy a premium template ($100-200). Admin customizes.
Content still works. Design is 'good enough' not 'cinematic.'
Works for Day 1. Product person hired post-raise for v2.
Plan D: Nilo builds it
If Nilo has the skills, just build the MVP.
Time cost: 2-3 days for a functional site.
Not consumer-grade but functional.
The content (MC conversations, daily updates) matters more than
the site quality. A mediocre site with great content > a beautiful
site with no content. Ship the content first, upgrade the container later.
